overview: Justin Sanger is an entrepreneur and visionary in the local advertising marketplace. Justin has started numerous companies over the past two decades, his last company LocalLaunch was sold to RHD/Dex in 2006. Justin is viewed as one of the leading experts in local search and social advertising marketplace and is widely appreciated as a dynamic leader and product innovator. Currently, Justin is the founder and CEO of his latest company, JoinLocal, a Denver-based Social Engagement Platform for SMBs.
